instructions: The "Roll20 Earthdawn by FASA" character sheet is optimized for 4th edition, but currently has limited support for other editions. It works OK all by itself, but works best with the "Earthdawn by FASA character sheet companion" API script (The one script enhances both the Earthdawn and 1879 character sheets).For more information please see [Earthdawn Sheet wiki page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Earthdawn_-_FASA_Official).
